p: AsA treatment retained the firmness of the green bean pods ( Figure 1C); similar results were shown in previous works, where sweet pepper and plum fruit treated with AsA had higher firmness than the control due to its antioxidant properties [ 15, 42]. The higher firmness of green bean samples treated with AsA could be explained by higher scavenging of ROS of cells leading to a decreased respiration rate [ 43]. It is well known that slowing oxidation preserves freshness and colour in fruits and vegetables.
